text: thumb|Canada Day's Fireworks in Quidi Vidi, St. John's, Newfoundland Canada Day is a national and an official holiday in Canada celebrating its anniversary of Confederation on 1 July 1867. It takes place annually on July 1st. == Other page == * Monarchy of Canada *O Canada - legally adopted on Canada Day in 1980. Category:Holidays of Canada Canada Category:July observances
title: Canada Day
